channel.title: areaVoid problem
channel.description: my area void has a sendquest if your in an area...it doesnt work ive tried triggering the areaVoid(); through command and everything any help? :\

item.title: areaVoid problem
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

my void does

if(coords){ sendquest }
i have 1 that works but the other one doesnt
i even tried substituting it with a looped refresh void which stopped the server :\

item.title: areaVoid problem
item.dc:creator: @Finnagon Finnagon
item.description:
@Finnagon wrote:

I made something like that once, I had it so when you stand at a certain grid reference it sends a message to tell you
but it didn’t work. I think you need to use the “For” statment or something like that so it’s continually checking for that condition.
